title: Unichat-Ts-Mcp-Server
description: Unichat MCP Server enables sending requests to various AI models (e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic) using the MCP protocol, supporting both STDIO and SSE mechanisms.
creator: amidabuddha

UNICHAT_MODEL.description: The preferred AI model name to use.

UNICHAT_API_KEY.description: Vendor API key required to authenticate requests.
